content:
Jihyun (Cindy) Hur is a Master’s student in Clinical Psychology at Computational Clinical Scinece Lab. Her research interests include computational psychiatry, neuroimaging, decision-making, major depressive and anxiety disorders.
After graduation, she pursues to be a PhD student at an university based in the United States.
Outside the lab, she is a rock climber, pianist, and (occasionally) k-pop dancer ðŸ’ƒðŸ˜„

title: Jihyun (Cindy) Hur
